data.description:
Three times per day, a Combat Engineer may attempt a quick fix on a piece of machinery (such as a radio, weapon, or vehicle).

These temporary repairs tend to break down quickly and in some cases can lead to the item's destruction.

Jury-Rig takes one (1) round and restores a number of Hit Points to the item equal to 1d6 per Experience Level of the Combat Engineer.

After 2d6 turns, the item suffers damage equal to the same amount restored by Jury-Rig.

If the item does not have Hit Points, it functions normally for 2d6 rounds before overheating, warping, short-circuiting, or otherwise becoming useless.
